channel.title: Client Help
channel.description:
Question 1:
alright, i just want to change the default ip for when my server starts up atm its this:
Username: wrath password: ********** server ip: (IP address) port: 43594
I want it to be this
Username: wrath password: ********** server ip: 127.0.0.1 port: 43594
Question 2:
I want to hide the ip address when my client starts up, atm it would look like this:
Username: wrath password: ********** server ip: 127.0.0.1 port: 43594
I want it to look like this:
Username: wrath password: **********
Question 3:
I want to change the name at the top of my client, right now it looks like this:
Pr0digyScape
I just want it to be WrathScape
If anyone can help with these questions it would be a great help :)

item.title: Client Help
item.dc:creator: @wrath wrath
item.description:
@wrath wrote:

you sure its in the applet, i couldn’t find it both automaticly and manually searching is there anywhere else it could be?

Read full topic

item.title: Client Help
item.dc:creator: @Goodbye_RS_Hello_RSP Goodbye RS, Hello RSPS
item.description:
@Goodbye_RS_Hello_RSP wrote:

In Applet_Sub1 search title = " replace whats in the “” with whatever you like.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Help
item.dc:creator: @wrath wrath
item.description:
@wrath wrote:

Question 1:

alright, i just want to change the default ip for when my server starts up atm its this:

Username: wrath
password: **********
server ip: (IP address)
port: 43594

I want it to be this

password: **********
server ip: 127.0.0.1
port: 43594

Question 2:

I want to hide the ip address when my client starts up, atm it would look like this:

password: **********
server ip: 127.0.0.1
port: 43594

I want it to look like this:

Username: wrath
password: **********

Question 3:

I want to change the name at the top of my client, right now it looks like this:

Pr0digyScape

I just want it to be WrathScape

If anyone can help with these questions it would be a great help
